title: Economist: This Recovery Is Broad-Based And Stable
teaser: As 2014 comes to a close, the economy is looking up. NPR's Linda Wertheimer talks to Mark Zandi of Moody's Analytics about the economic picture for 2015, and why he's feeling optimistic.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
